permissions: User must be in MaterialTransactionPolicy scope: admins are allowed; non-admins are scoped via visible material suppliers or via trips/sales customers/truckers they can access.
validation_notes: By default, invalidated and denied statuses are excluded unless --status is set or --include-all is used. If --date is provided, date range filters (--date-min/--date-max) are ignored; otherwise date-min/date-max apply to transaction_at. Server enforces strict boolean values for boolean-like filters (true/false). Server limits page size for users to 100.

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.description: Filter by business unit ID (comma-separated for multiple)
